text.title: Entering The World’s Largest City You’ve Never Heard Of
text.p: there's a city in China that has 36
million people and it's not Shanghai or
Beijing it's called chungqing and if
this city was its own country it would
be the 39th largest in the world there's
like mobs of people but amazingly few
people have heard of this city and I
know this after taking a poll on my
Instagram 58% of you guys said you'd
never heard of chonging before that was
enough to convince me to buy a plane
ticket to see what all the buzz is
about so what makes Ching so interesting
well the city is an architectural
Masterpiece often described as a 5D City
with its unique multi-level
infrastructure and it's been going viral
on Tik Tok why did you come to Chongqing
social media yeah it's been very viral
On th the city has layers of Roads
Bridges and buildings that are stacked
in a way that feels like a maze and if
you're not paying attention then you
just don't know what's next to you you
got to look up you got to look down you
got to look everywhere it's so so cool
get ready to be culture shocked by The
Wacky weird and bizarre she's vibrating
this thing into my ear now what the hell
as I take you on a journey through the
world's biggest city welcome to chong
[Music]
ching I have three goals while visiting
Chongqing the first is to meet as many
locals as I can and see if anyone speaks
English I don't speak English the second
is to find the city's number one most
famous Hot Pot restaurant a dish that
originates in this city and third is to
see if I can do this entire adventure
for $250 or less because despite being
the world's largest city I've heard that
chong ching is really affordable and
it's also really confusing to navigate
when they say that Chongqing is a 5D
City this is what they mean mean right
now I'm walking in a beautiful main
Square it's a historic Place beautiful
temples but you actually realize that
you're on the 22nd floor of a building
the craziest thing is we were walking on
ground level from my hotel the whole way
to get here and it just felt like
everything was flat I didn't even
realize that we were this High I've been
to almost every big city in Asia but
I've never felt something like this
where you're just standing in a main
square and you realize that you're on
the 22nd floor of a building it's
totally mindblowing like I don't
understand how the Architects were able
to build a city like this the only
comparison would be Hong Kong which is
kind of similar with the hills and stuff
but nothing like Chongqing you know
traveling Chongqing more than anywhere
else on the Asian continent really gives
me some culture shock totally Lost in
Translation not a single sign is
translated in English it is all
completely in Chinese the reason that
all these people are gathering here on
this sidewalk is because the Metro comes
straight out of the building it's funny
how there's like few touristy things to
do in the city and wherever they are
there's like mobs of people Chinese
tourists after watching the Metro go
through the side of this building I just
have to ride it for myself it goes
without saying chongqing's Metro is on a
whole another level literally on the
train we go bringing a shop on the
train we're making a lot of friends here
but they're quite shy where are you
going right now hot pot but it's too hot
for Hot Pot you need a cold
pot what do you like about chung ching
it's really nice and the food is
wonderful you know it's my first time
here the city is crazy you have to walk
a lot every day right and it's confusing
because like down up what do you think
about
America every day yeah many shooting
many byebye it's no surprise that gun
violence is the first thing these locals
think of when they think about America
even though it's incredibly safe here I
still want a guide to explore the hidden
corners of the city that's why I'm about
to meet up with my local friend Joy
who's taking me to the chong ching Zoo
famous for being one of the best zoos in
the world and home to 22 resident panda
bears hello I will show you the pandas
there's a fat Panda over there God W
this is the first time in my life I've

yellow I guess because I have a long

expecting to see pandas when I'm here
this is so cool it's like a bucket list
for China you know check see the pandas
great well of China pandas know

it's crazy how in the middle of the
